main event: Two PIPS of polarity were observed by GCI Radar, and two or three cylindrical objects were visually sighted near Reidsville, Georgia on April 25, 1961.
interesting points: The objects were moving in an erratic pattern at a high rate of speed.
The objects remained in sight for approximately 17 minutes before disappearing.
Radar indicated the objects were hovering and accelerating at a very high rate of speed.
On April 8, 1961, an object was observed for a period of time and moved in various directions in the sky near Reidsville, Georgia.
The object appeared to be between 1/2 and 1 diameter in size and was under the possession of Air Force personnel.
witnesses: Military personnel, Miss Peggy Turner and others
